doc:
Gladys Leslie https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gladys_Leslie 0 Gladys Leslie (March 5, 1899 – October 2, 1976) was an American actress in silent film, active in the 1910s and 1920s. Though less-remembered than superstars like Mary Pickford, she had a number of starring roles from 1917 to the early 1920s and was one of the young female stars of her day. Gladys_Leslie ( March_5_,_1899 – October_2_,_1976 ) was an_American_actress in silent_film , active in the_1910s_and_1920s . Though less-remembered than superstars like Mary_Pickford , she had a_number of starring_roles from 1917 to the_early_1920s and was one of the_young_female_stars of her_day .
